page.title: 15Leisure Activities.
page.content:
In our grid area there are two comunities, the small village of { {Pontrhydyfen}and the larger community of{Cwmavon.}My name is{Jonathan {Britton }and I live in{Pontrhydyfen. { Pontrhydyfen}now has two rugby pitches.During the last two years a new rugby pitch has been laid in { {Oakwood,}as the{Ryslyn,}being so near the river, was always water_logged. Pontrhydyfen has its own{rugby club whose team plays in black and amber colours.They also have{five}mini_rugby teams:under 9's, under 10's, under 11's, under12's and under 14's. The village has a very good {Bowling Club}which at present has two current{Welsh}team players. People wishing to play snooker, pool or even bingo can visit the Blue Scar club.
